code: @Override public String toString() {     return "DefaultRouteError{" + "phase=" + phase + ", throwable=" + throwable + '}'. }

// *********************************** // Helpers // *********************************** public static void set(CamelContext context, String routeId, RouteError.Phase phase, Throwable throwable) {     Route route = context.getRoute(routeId).     if (route != null) {         route.getRouteContext().setLastError(new DefaultRouteError(phase, throwable)).     } }
public static void reset(CamelContext context, String routeId) {     Route route = context.getRoute(routeId).     if (route != null) {         route.getRouteContext().setLastError(null).     } }
